name: Escape the Room:Escapist Puzzle Challenge Games
name_original: Escape the Room:Escapist Puzzle Challenge Games
description:
Can you escape the 20+ rooms?
The most creative room escape game!
Click and find the hidden items to find, puzzles, using your brain.
Open all doors and escape the ship.

* 20+ different scene
* No time trials
* Autosave
* No Wi-Fi needed
